content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am always in a panic when I hear someone talking around me. Are they really talking about me?
I am sorry to hear that, it can be hard to know if we are speaking specifically or not. What have you been doing so far to try and deal with the situation? Is there anything that I can help you with?
Sometimes I will listen to their talk to confirm that they are not talking with me.
I am so sorry to hear that, it sounds like you are having a bit of a panic when you hear someone talking about you. Do you have any friends you can confide in to talk to?
